"Check out the Cauldron?":
"Hey, <%me>. You've been exploring
the Cauldron lately, right? That place used to be a little
more laid back when the dragorii were friendly, but
now they don't seem to like strangers at all. It's a pain
when they attack us for no reason. Anyway, I'm going
to the Cauldron on a mission. How about you come
with me? No one will complain if it's a request, right?

*Go with Zeno only and complete the mission
with an A Rank or better"

"おっ、<%me>。
今、火山洞窟の探索とかやってるんだろ？
昔は龍族も友好的で楽だったんだが
最近は何でか知らんが排他的なんだよな。
見境なく襲ってくるし、骨が折れるだろ？
ちょうど俺もヒマしてたところだし
一緒に火山洞窟、行ってみるか？
依頼って形なら、誰も文句言わないだろ。

※ゼノのみ同行、Aランク以上でクリア"
